channel.title: Simplifications on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Simplifications on Simba Tango

item.title: Look! No hands!
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ mag3737 There seems to be a common misunderstanding that you are not supposed to use your arms when dancing tango. That is wrong on so many levels. I can see where it comes from, as it is a common mistake among beginners to do try leading with their hands, and not using the rest of their bodies. But one thing is to make point to beginners and quite another to elevate it to a universal truth.
